text: Péronne is a commune in the Hauts-de-France region in the Somme department in the north of France. It is close to where the Battles of the Somme took place during World War I. The Museum of the Great War (known in French as the Historial de la Grande Guerre) is located in the château. Category:Communes in Somme Category:Subprefectures in France
title: Péronne, Somme
